name: Thought Worm III
book: Pathfinder Player Companion: Psychic Anthology © 2017, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as per thought worm II, except a target that succeeds at its Will save still takes a –2 penalty on Will saves against your mind-affecting spells and effects for the same duration. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同精神蛀虫II一般，除了目标在成功通过该法术意志豁免时，其意志豁免依然会在相同的持续时间内承受-2减值。该法术可以被降阶施法。
